医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人类处理来自意想不到的大脑区域的数字的能力新的研究表明，人类独特的数字概念化能力可能根植于大脑深处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Human-ability-to-process-numbers-traced-to-unexpected-brain-region.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Human-ability-to-process-numbers-traced-to-unexpected-brain-region.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cba3abee-43ea-4ec2-b7d8-d458a1ea6272 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 22:01:10 -0500 Human ability to process numbers traced to unexpected brain region
血清蛋白组合测试可以帮助识别儿童癌症幸存者的心肌病风险早期疾病检测有利于确保患者获得最佳结果。但寻找非侵入性、有效的方法来预测疾病风险是一个巨大的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Serum- Protein-panel-test-can-help-identify-cardiomyopathy-risk-in-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Serum- Protein-panel-test-can-help-identify-cardiomyopathy-risk-in-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=230850a1-708c-4a54-bc0b-cc18c7411d54 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 21:56:00 -0500 Serum protein panel test can help identify cardiomyopathy risk in childhood cancer survivors
研究显示美国绝大多数州的药店数量正在减少南加州大学和加州大学伯克利分校研究人员的一项新研究显示，自 2010 年以来，美国约有三分之一的零售药店关闭，近年来绝大多数州的药店数量总体下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Study-reveals-vast-majority-of-US-states-experiencing-decline-in-drugstores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Study-reveals-vast-majority-of-US-states-experiencing-decline-in-drugstores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de28104b-ab42-4667-9405-5ffbe81f6914 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 21:47:19 -0500 Study reveals vast majority of U.S. states experiencing decline in drugstores
研究破解了免疫治疗耐药的悬案密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的一项研究可能终于破解了免疫疗法耐药性的悬案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Study-cracks-the-cold-case-of-immunotherapy-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Study-cracks-the-cold-case-of-immunotherapy-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2862b676-7f38-4dd1-81a7-a247e0f9f761 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 21:40:31 -0500 Study cracks the cold case of immunotherapy resistance
新算法识别驱动侵袭性癌症生长的肿瘤细胞第一个能够识别哪些肿瘤细胞正在驱动侵袭性癌症生长的计算机算法是由英国癌症研究中心资助的伦敦大学学院和弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的科学家开发的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/New-algorithm-identizes-tumor-cells-driven-aggressive-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/New-algorithm-identizes-tumor-cells-driven-aggressive-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53a8783c-e78d-4ff5-80ae-87f6557c20c6 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 21:35:01 -0500 New algorithm identifies tumor cells driving aggressive cancer growth
脊柱手法与降低布他比妥治疗紧张型头痛有关由 University Hospitals Connor Whole Health 领导的一组研究人员发现，脊椎手法治疗 (SMT) 与紧张型头痛 (TTH) 患者服用布他比妥处方和药物过度使用性头痛 (MOH) 的可能性降低之间存在关联。他们的回顾性研究发表在《健康科学报告》上，涵盖了 2013 年至 2024 年美国国家数据库中的 6,200 多名患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Spinal-manipulation-linked-to-lower-butalbital-use-in-tension-type-headaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Spinal-manipulation-linked-to-lower-butalbital-use-in-tension-type-headaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32402db7-126c-40f8-ae13-0efc7930d3d7 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 21:28:22 -0500 Spinal manipulation linked to lower butalbital use in tension-type headaches
新的免疫疗法可提高胶质母细胞瘤的生存率并减少肿瘤负担Wistar 研究所的 David B. Weiner 博士-;执行副总裁、疫苗和免疫治疗中心主任兼 WW Smith 慈善信托基金会癌症研究杰出教授 -；他和他的实验室成功测试了一种新的免疫疗法，在临床前实验室测试中，该疗法可靠地提高了胶质母细胞瘤的生存率并减少了肿瘤负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/New-immune-therapy-improves-survival-and-reduces-tumor-burden-in-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/New-immune-therapy-improves-survival-and-reduces-tumor-burden-in-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86487369-031c-4c49-a696-b6f59ed986fd Tue, 03 Dec 2024 20:56:20 -0500 New immune therapy improves survival and reduces tumor burden in glioblastoma
社交媒体与青少年久坐时间增加有关世界卫生组织建议青少年每天静坐时间不超过两到三个小时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Social-media-linked-to-increased-sedentary-time-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Social-media-linked-to-increased-sedentary-time-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a61b3da-92f5-4afa-97f4-72edd1a7a7eb Tue, 03 Dec 2024 20:50:59 -0500 Social media linked to increased sedentary time in adolescents
研究人员旨在揭示获得性听力损失的原因并寻找潜在的治疗方法凯斯西储大学和 Mass Eye and Ear 的研究人员将获得美国国家耳聋和其他通讯障碍研究所提供的 320 万美元的新五年资助，研究导致获得性听力损失 (AHL) 的原因，并寻求新的预防方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Researchers-aim-to-uncover-causes-of-acquired-hearing-loss-and-find-pottial-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Researchers-aim-to-uncover-causes-of-acquired-hearing-loss-and-find-pottial-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee0dba08-c68a-4972-a75f-f9f9e609e36e Tue, 03 Dec 2024 20:45:38 -0500 Researchers aim to uncover causes of acquired hearing loss and find potential therapies
研究发现慢性疲劳综合征患者 T 细胞耗竭康奈尔大学的一项新研究表明，慢性疲劳综合症会导致杀死病原体的免疫 T 细胞耗尽。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Study-finds-T-cell-exhaustion-in-chronic-fatigue-syndrome-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Study-finds-T-cell-exhaustion-in-chronic-fatigue-syndrome-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a7e9ff0-6103-477b-aaef-055652d04ada Tue, 03 Dec 2024 20:29:02 -0500 Study finds T cell exhaustion in chronic fatigue syndrome patients
